oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colton Greene Account Book
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Mystic Memphi; finance;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Account with Cole & Co. (dealers in paint) of Colton Greene for the Memphi: small notebook listing quantaties of many colors of paint and other supplies purchased between 1/23 and 2/13 at a total cost of $331.09.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
